analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/46/0x3ee7ffc6941d5f41dda94c4380f52403e5221586.sol:
	Contract Criptolira has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/46/0x3ee7ffc6941d5f41dda94c4380f52403e5221586.sol#211)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/46/0x3ee7ffc6941d5f41dda94c4380f52403e5221586.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/46/0x3ee7ffc6941d5f41dda94c4380f52403e5221586.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/46/0x3ee7ffc6941d5f41dda94c4380f52403e5221586.sol#81) is not in mixedCase
